column6:
This is a well maintained, quiet, and clean condo. Our condo is adjacent to the pool in the rear of the complex on the ground floor. Perfect for families. Less than a block from the beach, the Palms Cafe & Whataburger.

Queen beds in both bedrooms & a queen sofa sleeper in living room. The master bedroom has an adjoining full bath. The 2nd full bath serves the other bedroom & also has a tv. Gas grill & high speed wireless internet. Baby playpen.

Mandated Tax: 
Hotel 6%
SPI 8.5%
Venue 2%
column9: Pool Side 2/2 Condo 1 Block From Beach, Grill/Wifi
